price: (11) [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
